Unit: Vehicle¶

class battle.Vehicles¶

Vehicle class.

Parameters:
  • operators ((int)) – Number of operators inside the vehicle. From 2 to 4.
  • __recharge ((int)) – Random value from 1000 to 2000.
  • __health ((float)) – Health of the vehicle.
do_attack()¶

Calculate attack value of the vehicle.

Returns:Possible attack value of all units in the vehicle.
get_recharge()¶

Get vehicle’s recharge.

Returns:Recharge value
take_damage(attack_value)¶

Calculate health when the vehicle receive damage. The damage spreads of all solder in the vehicle.

Parameters:attack_value ((float)) – Value of damage to be taken.
